message: 'package' should be separated from previous statement.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.HashMap' import. Should be before 'org.apache.metron.enrichment.utils.ThreatIntelUtils'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Map' import. Should be before 'org.apache.metron.enrichment.utils.ThreatIntelUtils'.
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
